entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
